about_the_game:
Choi, who is on the verge of dying from boredom, is visited by a demon one day. The demon suggests Choi to try him space-time travel. Choi accepts the offer and travels through time and space. The Space Police, who protects the order of the universe, discovers that time and space are being distorted by Choi and begins to chase Choi.

Choi, your alter ego! Don't get caught by the space police and start traveling through time and space!

This version is the first version of space-time travel. In the future version, various space-time travel will be introduced. In order to successfully travel, develop the ability to avoid being caught by the space police through this version.


Feature

  • Run away to Telebox with information of distance to the Telebox
  • Hide behind obstacles to avoid the Space Cop
  • Eat burgers to recover stamina lost from running and to level up in order to transform into more strong and agile Choi
  • Annoy the Space Cop by kicking obstacles to Space Cop. You will get coins and items
  • You can improve your stats with coins on the platform
  • You can do Walk, Run, Kick, Somersault and Using Item in this version

name: Choi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Choi is an arcade game that requires physical agility. Choi makes a contract with the demon and is traveling freely in space and time. The space police in charge of space order started chasing Choi for distorting time and space. Hide behind a tree or kick a rock to evade the space cops and get away.
